effect.Name: Addition With Reciprocal Square Root
effect.description: Addition With Reciprocal Square Root - Shader adds base and mixes colors with each other then colors are calculated by reciprocal square root
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Addition With Reciprocal Square Root (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader adds base and mixes colors with each other then colors are calculated by reciprocal square root

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
